sn6.14:2.3: Aruṇavatiṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, rājadhāniṁ → aruṇavatiyaṁ kho pana bhikkhave rājadhāniyaṁ (pts1ed, mr)
sn6.14:3.4: khiyyanti → khīyanti (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed, pts2ed)
sn6.14:5.3: sahassilokadhātuṁ → sahassīlokadhātuṁ (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed, pts2ed)
sn6.14:6.1: Ārambhatha → ārabhatha (bj); ārabbhatha (sya-all, pts1ed, pts2ed) | nikkamatha → nikkhamatha (bj, pts1ed, pts2ed)
